amendment.description: Amendment updates feasibility study completion requirements to align with a recently-signed MOU between the project stakeholders and the Bureau of Reclamation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
